name: WitchCraft (itch) (LifeOfMattLau)
description:
Use your unique telekinetic powers to manipulate objects and create concealed pathways, to escape the unbearable and treacherous prison. 

The medieval prison is buried under ancient history. Guarded by angry spirits who will do anything in their power to prevent prisoners from escaping.

Being trapped in the prison for over 100 years.You  learn to absorb the power residue of your fallen witch clan and utilise your telekinetic powers to redeem FREEDOM. 

Cautiously, manoeuvre your way through the maze like prison, in search for freedom!
